article_title: The Next President Won't Be Able To Dismantle Obamacare

article_metadata.description: Myriad health experts speaking at the Association of Health Care Journalists annual meeting in Cleveland don't see either Texas Sen. Ted Cruz or businessman Donald Trump being able to dismantle the Affordable Care Act should they be elected President of the United States.
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Myriad health experts speaking at the Association of Health Care Journalists annual meeting in Cleveland don't see either Texas Sen. Ted Cruz or businessman Donald Trump being able to dismantle the Affordable Care Act should they be elected President of the United States.
og.title: Sorry, Trump And Cruz: The Next President Won't Be Able To Dismantle Obamacare
